Name: Pushalot - Send a notification
Description: Sends a notification using the Pushalot REST API.
Author: HumanPrinter

Parameters.Name: AuthorizationToken
Parameters.Label: Specify the authorization token as registered in the Pushalot Dashboard
Parameters.HelpText: Goto [Apps+Tokens](https://pushalot.com) and create a token for your application, e.g. Octopus.

Parameters.Name: Body
Parameters.Label: The body of the message
Parameters.HelpText: Body of the message. Will show in client app in message listing in shortened version and in message detail page in full version, so when possible try to keep most important information in the beginning of the text.

Parameters.Name: Title
Parameters.Label: The title for the message
Parameters.HelpText: Title for the message. Will show in client app in message listing in shortened version and in message detail in full version, so when possible try to keep most important information in the beginning of the text.

Parameters.Name: Source
Parameters.Label: Source
Parameters.HelpText: Notification source name that will be displayed instead of authorization token's app name. When empty, the parameter will be omitted in the Pushalot API call.

Parameters.Name: Timeout
Parameters.Label: Timeout in seconds
Parameters.HelpText: The maximum timout in seconds for the request.
